title: Kahoot! Multiplication for iPhone and iPad brings 20 mini-games to teach children math
content:
The developer DragonBox is expanding Kahoot!’s world with a new app focused on teaching math to children. Here’s everything you need to know about the new Kahoot! Multiplication app.

more…

The post Kahoot! Multiplication for iPhone and iPad brings 20 mini-games to teach children math appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: DragonBox is expanding Kahoot!'s world with a new app focused on teaching maths to children with Kahoot! Multiplication.
